name: get-pricing-data
description: Cloud Function to fetch pricing data from GCS.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && gcloud functions deploy getPricingData --project=manifest-setup-342214 --gen2 --runtime=nodejs20 --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region=us-central1 --entry-point=getPricingData --source=. --set-env-vars GCS_BUCKET_NAME=firestore-cloud-comparator
